subject: Collaboration with Professional drifting pilot
description_text:
Hi! I am Claudiu 19 years old, i run a professionaly built Mazda Rx8 in Pro2 class of the Norwegian drift championship (pictures bellow)
I want to focus and give my best on the track, i practise a lot on my simulator. With that i would like to ask if you guys would like to join the team! 
I am not asking for free stuff, i want us to collaborate and i want you to feel like you are getting something out of this aswell! I have other sponsors that are very happy with the things i am bringing to their companies ?
Would you be interested to discuss this further? 

Greetings Claudiu B.
